name: Sebastian Lukasz Nowak
profile_summary:

Proficient in **JavaScript**, **HTML**, **CSS**, and **SQL**, I excel at integrating third-party tools such as **Zapier** and **Workato** to enhance operational efficiency. My strong problem-solving skills and effective communication abilities enable me to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact solutions.

With a solid background in full-stack development, I leverage technologies like **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python** for custom application development while ensuring compliance with industry standards. I am also experienced in implementing large-scale automation strategies that drive process improvements across healthcare and financial sectors.
